channel.title: [PI] how do i add new ICON crowns?
channel.description:
Alright guys, These are the ICONS i am using ATM on my server [See Below Picture]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/10shyd5.png[/img]
And These are the ones that i want TO USE/ADD.
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/mww50g.png[/img]
[size=12pt]I have already replaced them in SPRITES folder with the new ones i want to use, but 'example': Server support/Advisor Rank those new icons DO NOT exist yet...my question is:HOW and WHERE do i add the new ones?[/size]

item.title: [PI] how do i add new ICON crowns?
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

Simple, just go into cache, find the current crows, right click edit, and just paste the new ones.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] how do i add new ICON crowns?

item.title: [PI] how do i add new ICON crowns?
item.dc:creator: @MrBeka MrBeka
item.description:
@MrBeka wrote:

[quote=“go armand, post:2, topic:412547”]Can I say something off topic?

I personally think that the new ones you want to implement are ugly as shit
Stick with the old ones (Y)

But Goodluck with adding them :D[/quote]
LOL,i rather use the new ones
